attributes.action: We request that the government start an independent judicial revue
attributes.additional_details: To look at the assessors inability to provide DWP with true and accurate, factual information in their assessments from  ATOS, CAPITA, MAXIMUS
attributes.background: The DWP currently use the services of ATOS,CAPITA and MAXIMUS to medically assess claimants for Personal Independence Payments.

rejection.details:
You might want to sign this petition, which is about the same issue:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/130787
